title: S1 stuggles
body:
I get autofilled to everyones fav role, im s1 37 lp, my mid laners is playing his first ever ranked game.
 When he feeds kat and we lose I lost 20 lp??? What is that about. Its like riot dont want me to reach gold.

Why am I getting unrankeds and just straight up bad team mates in s1, everytime I have demoted I get straight back in to s1, feels like im hexed.

Anyone else feeling my pain?

replies.body: I'm in the lower mmr team in my most matches. I think it may be the algorithm for climbing. U will get higher mmr once u beat the stronger team

you have a negative win-rate for the season. 
you just had a 4 win streak and still have more loses than wins.

when you reverse this you'll lose less LP when you lose, and gain more when you win. 
right now the system believes you belong in S1 for a while, based on your current stats.

yeah but it can feel bad when you're in your promos to gold, 2 wins in, everything is going sweet, and then the client crashes on the loading screen

and you have to restart it, reinstall the last patch, and then finally load in only to find your team did a remake, and so you lose a game that could possibly had taken you to gold 5,

and then you get whingy bitch who runs it down mid because they got autofilled (the main reason I usually queue with fill as my secondary even though playing support atm is as boring as pick janna, build ardent, press e, win), 

and then the last game you just aren't playing so flash because you're tilted 180* and so you're stuck in silver 1 again.
